thread.title: Upland Software Partners with RMGS to Expand Presence in Middle East
thread.title_full: Upland Software Partners with RMGS to Expand Presence in Middle East

author: PRNW
title: Upland Software Partners with RMGS to Expand Presence in Middle East
text:
AUSTIN, Texas , Sept. Upland Software, Inc. (Nasdaq: UPLD), a leader in cloud-based Enterprise Work Management applications, today announced that it is partnering with RMGS to expand the availability of Upland's software applications in the Middle East . RMGS, an international technology consulting provider based in Egypt , will sell and implement Upland's professional services automation (PSA) and time and expense tracking application, Tenrox, to Middle East service organizations seeking to deliver the best possible experience to their clients while maximizing profitability.
"The growing demand in the Middle East for enterprise cloud software for professional services, as well as time and expense management, signifies the importance of having a reliable and comprehensive Tenrox partner based in the region," said Kevin Sequeira , Upland Software's general manager and director of product management for the Tenrox line of business. "Our partnership with RMGS extends Upland's global footprint while ensuring companies in the Middle East have the local support and service they need to succeed."
RMGS specializes in outsourced product support and development, and will be reselling and implementing Tenrox installations in Egypt , UAE, Saudi Arabia and Qatar . Tenrox customers will benefit from an Upland partner providing local consulting and support, while also having access to Upland's global resources.
"Tenrox has been gaining impressive growth globally for decades and is now leading the charge to create an innovative, integrated cloud platform for time and expense management and professional services," said Rami Fahim , managing director at RMGS. "We are excited to team with Upland Software to provide a highly differentiated cloud offering for the burgeoning demand in the Middle East ."
For more information on RMGS, visit www.r-m-g-s.com/Partners .
About Upland Software
Upland (Nasdaq: UPLD) is a leading provider of cloud-based Enterprise Work Management software. Our family of applications connects people through technology, automates the flow of work and brings visibility to all aspects of the organization. With more than 1,600 customers around the globe, and over 225,000 users, Upland helps teams in IT, marketing, finance, professional services and process excellence run their operations smoothly, adapt to change quickly and achieve better results every day. To learn more, visit www.uplandsoftware.com .
About Tenrox
The Tenrox workflow-driven, cloud application is designed to meet the challenges of managing globally dispersed services organizations and project workforces. It automates project initiation, resource management, time and expense, and reporting and analytics to enable customers to improve the management of billable projects from pipeline to close. Tenrox offers configurable cost and billing rules, including chargeback or invoicing, with certified integrations to all major CRM and accounting systems. Organizations worldwide, including Abbot Vascular, Autodesk, Estee Lauder , Eaton, General Electric and JDA Software, trust the Tenrox product to meet their requirements in the areas of Professional Services Automation (PSA) and time and expense tracking. Tenrox is part of the Upland Software family of cloud-based enterprise work management applications. For more information, visit www.tenrox.com .
